title: Chemical analysis of Mycenaean pottery from the Menelaion and its vicinity
abstract: A chemical characterisation of the Mycenaean pottery from the major prehistoric site of the Menelaion in Laconia.  The study defines the  the lcoal pottery production and identifies the imports from various centres
